name: Synch (itch)
description:
Instructions

- Use the mouse to interact with buttons.

- Slow down elements by pressing the corresponding number (only use top row number keys)

A zen-like puzzle game about slowing down elements and synchronizing them into visually appealing patterns.

There is no timer. Just relax, take your time, and enjoy the end results.

Originally developed for an assignment, I really enjoyed working on this game and might release additional levels in the future.

Royalty-free music courtesy of Kevin Macleod.

Most color palettes generated by @PaletteCLR.

Curved line renderer utility courtesy of haagndaaz.
